target.message:
Remove `position: relative` from grid columns

Prompted by #25254, I dug into our Git history to see why we add `position: relative` to our grid classes and mixins. Turns out, I have no idea and added it to v3 in a commit that fixed an unrelated issue—see https://github.com/twbs/bootstrap/commit/0f17f9b7f7fe15bb4ce6301caa2600bfd30e63d7.
Revamp docs left sidebar to show all groups' nav items for easier docs browsing

Allow Tooltips/Popovers to work in shadow DOM

Fix custom range thumb style (#26385)

* Fix focus box shadow of custom ranges

* Put `:focus` selector right after `.custom-range`
* Remove unnecessary `outline: none`

* Fix box-shadow issues in IE/Edge

* Better align

* Fix thumb vertical positions in IE/Edge

* Fix incorrect formula of thumb vertical positions in Webkit

* Fix an incorrect comment

* Fix incorrect box-shadow-width
